WebTransport_API.summary: The WebTransport API provides a modern update to {{domxref("WebSockets API", "WebSockets", "", "nocode")}}, transmitting data between client and server using HTTP/3 Transport. WebTransport provides support for multiple streams, unidirectional streams, and out-of-order delivery. It enables reliable transport via {{domxref("Streams API", "streams", "", "nocode")}} and unreliable transport via UDP-like datagrams.
